task.name: v.crossbones
task.description: A GRASS version of Crossbones: Create simple 3D representations of skeletal assemblages.

parameter.name: input
parameter.description: Input ASCII file with point measurements

parameter.name: delimiter
parameter.description: Field delimiter for ASCII input file (default: comma)

parameter.name: idcolumn
parameter.description: Position of ID column in ASCII input file (leftmost = 1)

parameter.name: xcolumn
parameter.description: Position of X (Easting) column in ASCII input file (leftmost = 1)

parameter.name: ycolumn
parameter.description: Position of Y (Northing) column in ASCII input file (leftmost = 1)

parameter.name: zcolumn
parameter.description: Position of Z (Elevation) column in ASCII input file (leftmost = 1)

parameter.name: ratios
parameter.description: List of length:1 ratios for specific bone IDs (boneID1=ratio, boneID2=ratio, ...).

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Permite a los archivos de salida sobrescribir los archivos existentes.
